item.description:
In recent interviews, both Donald Trump and Robert Kiyosaki (Rich Dad Poor Dad) said if they were to start from scratch today and build their fortune, they would use Networking Marketing and the Home Based Business Industry to do it.

 

2 of the richest men in the world are pointing you to

the home based business explosion with

Industry Legend Mr. Steve Schulz!

 

If you could meet Trump or Kiyosaki, you would jump at the chance...meet the man who made his millions the way they wish they would have!
item.why: When you get the opportunity to meet a multi-millionaire who is going to show you how he made his millions, you want to take the opportunity!

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Come Meet the 14 Million Dollar Man Steve Schulz
